artist: Engraver: Benjamin Smith; Artist: after Borckhardt; Publisher: Hurst, Robinson & Co.
creditline:
The William M. Ladd Collection
Gift of Herschel V. Jones, 1916
inscription: LL, in margin below image, lettered: C. Borckhardt delt. | LR, in margin below image, lettered: B. Smith sculpsit | BC, in margin below image, lettered: John Boydell, Esqr / Elected Alderman of the City of London September 1782 / Servd Sheriff in 1785 & Lord Mayor in 1790 / Died Decr. 12, 1804 in the 85, Year of his Age / London: Pub. Feb. 1. 1819, by Hurst, Robinson & Co. late Boydells, 90 Cheapside
portfolio: From Frontispiece from Liber Veritatis, vol. 3 (London, 1819)
title: John Boydell, Esq.
